A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I tried to like this film\,.. I really tried. The comedy was horrible\, the story had more plot holes than a piece of Swiss cheese\, and 70% of the questions in the las movie were either left unanswered or completely disregarded. I feel so bad for Mark Hamill especially. Watching him in this role was like watching a loved one in hospice slowly go downhill and die. As a movie this is bad. As a Star Wars movie this is horrendous. Even now I tried to be lenient to this merchandise driven pile of galactic trash. Thanks for hearing my honest Star Wars loving opinion.
